Description: On Rt. 5339 East in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Centerbrook Pl; Rt. 5338N/S (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to icy conditions. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 5.1 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
